import React, { useState } from 'react' const UseReducer1 = () => { const [userregister, setUserregister] = useState({ name:"", email:"", phone:"", work:"", password:"" }) const handleInput =(e)=>{ let name = e.target.name let value = e.target.value setUserregister({...userregister,[name]:value}) } return ( <>
) } export default UseReducer1
